job.title: Senior Software Development Engineer - Robotic Process Automation
job.description: strongOur PurposebrbrstrongWe work to connect and power an inclusive digital economy that benefits everyone everywhere by making transactions safe simple smart and accessible Using secure data and networks partnerships and passion our innovations and solutions help individuals financial institutions governments and businesses realize their greatest potential Our decency quotient or DQ drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths views and experiences We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team  one that makes better decisions drives innovation and delivers better business resultsbrbrstrongJob TitlebrbrstrongSenior Software Development Engineer  Robotic Process AutomationbrbrstronguOverviewbrustrongulli The GBSC Automation team is built upon strong contributors with leadership abilities innovative mindsets and variety of technical skillslili The group acts as an idea incubators supporting the Share Services Organization initiatives by providing innovative and disruptive solutions to automate processesbrliulRolebrulli Develop test and implement software automation processes aimed at transforming many aspects of our business operations via Robotics Process Automation and other automation technicslili Work closely with Mastercard internal customers to identify shortterm and longterm objective alignment to create service roadmapslili Support automation pipeline execution through cross team project management and prioritizationlili Own and manage product documentation enables selfservice support andor works to reduce overheadlili Provide metrics and automation to support Operations and the global organizationbrliulstronguAll About Youbrustrongulli Are you motivated by new challenges and ready to join a creative and innovative teamlili Are you a rapid learner and selfstarterlili Do you enjoy improving processes to eliminate waste and streamline performancelili Have you collaborated with a team of diverse skills and experiencelili Do you have experience mentoring others and assisting in growing the overall team capabilitiesbrliulstronguEssential Knowledge Skills And Experiencebrustrongulli Bachelors degree in Computer Science Information Technology or equivalent Engineering experiencelili Expertise in Robotic Process Automation RPA preferably with Automation Anywherelili Practical experience in ITProgramming NET or Java Analytics Database SQLlili Experience in software development life cycle on analytics or systems integration engagements across strategy design and implementationlili Large scale project management experiencelili Must be able to think strategically and act tacticallylili Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills with the ability to exercise mature judgmentlili Advanced SQL experiencelili Strong oral and written communication skills including presentation skillslili Ability to work independentlybrliulstronguDesirable Or Additional Capabilitiesbrustrongulli Team management or leadership experiencelili Understanding of the Shared Services Center organizational conceptlili General knowledge of Corporate Finance functionslili Six Sigma certifiedbrliulDue to COVID19 most of our employees are working from home Weve implemented a virtual hiring process and continue to interview candidates by phone or video and are onboarding new hires remotely We value the safety of each member of our community because we know were all in this
